sources.title: The Girl-Getters
sources.description: Title: The Girl-Getters Summary: In a seaside village, a group of local young men mingle among the seasonal tourists in search of sexual conquests. Near the end of one summer, the leader of the group, Tinker, a strolling ... Directed by: Michael Winner Actors: Oliver Reed, Jane Merrow, Barbara Ferris Production Company: Kenneth Shipman Productions Release Date: 18 March 1965 (Netherlands) Aspect Ratio: 1.78 : 1 In a seaside village, a group of local young men mingle among the seasonal tourists in search of sexual conquests. Near the end of one summer, the leader of the group, Tinker, a strolling photographer, aims to conquer a fashion model from a well-to-do family, but he finds himself unexpectedly falling in love. The tables thus turned, Tinker begins to see that maybe it's not the tourists who are being used in these sexual games.

metadata.Plot: In a seaside village, a group of local young men mingle among the seasonal tourists in search of sexual conquests. Near the end of one summer, the leader of the group, Tinker, a strolling photographer, aims to conquer a fashion model from a well-to-do family, but he finds himself unexpectedly falling in love. The tables thus turned, Tinker begins to see that maybe it's not the tourists who are being used in these sexual games.
metadata.Actors: Oliver Reed, Jane Merrow, Barbara Ferris
